title: Increase in AD - movement along SRPC

content.prompt: An increase in aggregate demand will cause which of the following?

choices.label: A movement along a given short-run Phillips curve
The long-run Phillips curve to become horizontal
The short-run Phillips curve to shift to the left
The long-run Phillips curve to shift to the right
The long-run Phillips curve to shift to the left

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
